Factsheet

Developer:
Diego Giacomelli
Based in Porto Alegre - Brazil
Release date:
Prototype - 2005
Platforms:
Windows
Website:
github.com/giacomelli/ProjectBreakout
Regular Price:
Free

Description

An unfinished breakout game made using C# and MDX (Managed DirectX)

History

Prototype

In 2005 I (Hal), Wanderson Pereira (Kid Graphics) and Giusepe Casagrande (Guardian Skarabrae) started the development of a breakout game called "Project Breakout". The game was programmed using C# and MDX (Managed Direct X).

Features

  • Fast pace breakout game
  • A lot of visual effects
